name: Knight without sword
description:
This is a role-playing game
In the game, you have no means of attack
You need to lead the chickens (teammates) who will imitate your behavior to open the treasure box and overcome various dangerous mechanisms.
Get all the coins and reach the finish line
At the same time, enemies armed with weapons will also imitate your behavior
Enemies can help you open treasure chests, but they can also steal your gold coins.
You can use them carefully to open treasure chests, but be careful
Only by collecting all gold coins can you pass the level

The game uses a unique mechanism. Enemies and teammates will imitate your behavior. If you move forward, they will move forward. If you move left, they will move left.


And when you are in opposite directions, your behavior seems to be opposite


Sometimes, when the direction between you and your teammates or enemies is vertical, your actions may seem unrelated.
However, if you look carefully, they are still imitating your behavior. If you move forward, they will move forward. If you move left, they will move left.


In the game, teammates and enemies can open treasure chests, but you can't. Therefore, you need to think carefully about how to use them.
Once the treasure chest is opened and gold coins appear, be careful. Enemies can also take away gold coins, and you must collect all gold coins before you can pass the level.


There will be a lot of big rocks and pine trees in the game, and you can use them to adjust the relative positions of the characters.
At the same time, you should also note that the enemy will attack all characters one step ahead, including other enemies, after the movement is completed.


So you can have enemies kill each other when they're out of action


The game has a total of 86 levels, each of which is carefully crafted. You will encounter simple levels, and of course there will also be particularly difficult ones.
Don’t worry, when you repeatedly try to pass a level and fail, cheats for passing the level will appear on the failure page and pause page.


The steps to pass the level are hidden in the cheats, and you can get tips.


You can also display them directly into the game scene, just check them and then try the level again.
When your operation is different from the game guide, you will also be reminded by color

By clearing this game, you will become smarter!


Story background
A long time ago, there was a special knight in the kingdom. He was very smart and could defeat all enemies without using weapons. Unfortunately, the knight fell seriously ill and passed away. In order to commemorate him, the king began to select knights who could rival him, and Those who can pass the selection are called Knight without sword
